text:
[Verse]
Feel the drops they fall so light
Dance around under moonlight
Wet shoes splashing through the night
Laugh it off we feel so right

[Verse 2]
Streetlights glow a yellow hue
Puddles form a mirror view
Spinning round in skies so blue
Soaked in fun just me and you

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Forget all the pain
Every drop's a gain
Let's just dance again

[Verse 3]
Clothes are drenched but hearts are warm
Embrace the rising storm
No umbrella to conform
Freedom in this natural form

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Forget all the pain
Every drop's a gain
Let's just dance again

[Bridge]
No need for any cover
In this rain we rediscover
Every moment feels like wonder
With you my glowing thunder
title: Dancing in the Rain
